Uses of Package
com.qualcomm.hardware.adafruit

  • Packages that use com.qualcomm.hardware.adafruit 
    Package Description
    com.qualcomm.hardware.adafruit  
  • Classes in com.qualcomm.hardware.adafruit used by com.qualcomm.hardware.adafruit 
    Class and Description
    BNO055IMU
    BNO055IMU interface abstracts the functionality of the Bosch/Sensortec BNO055 Intelligent 9-axis absolute orientation sensor.
    BNO055IMU.AccelBandwidth 
    BNO055IMU.AccelerationIntegrator
    BNO055IMU.AccelerationIntegrator encapsulates an algorithm for integrating acceleration information over time to produce velocity and position.
    BNO055IMU.AccelPowerMode 
    BNO055IMU.AccelRange 
    BNO055IMU.AccelUnit 
    BNO055IMU.AngleUnit 
    BNO055IMU.CalibrationData
    See Section 3.6.4 of the BNO055 Specification.
    BNO055IMU.CalibrationStatus 
    BNO055IMU.GyroBandwidth 
    BNO055IMU.GyroPowerMode 
    BNO055IMU.GyroRange 
    BNO055IMU.MagOpMode 
    BNO055IMU.MagPowerMode 
    BNO055IMU.MagRate 
    BNO055IMU.Parameters
    Instances of Parameters contain data indicating how a BNO055 absolute orientation sensor is to be initialized.
    BNO055IMU.PitchMode 
    BNO055IMU.Register
    BNO055IMU.Register provides symbolic names for each of the BNO055 device registers.
    BNO055IMU.SensorMode
    Sensor modes are described in Table 3-5 (p21) of the BNO055 specification, where they are termed "operation modes".
    BNO055IMU.SystemError 
    BNO055IMU.SystemStatus 
    BNO055IMU.TempUnit
